item.title: Using spreadsheets as a level editor for games using hexagons
item.description: A little blog post about using spreadsheets for level design in games using hexagons

item.title: Spreadsheets as Notational Environment for Paper Weaving
item.description: This work explores how spreadsheets can serve as the foundation for the creation of a hybrid design medium for paper weaving.
